entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Adjust `CommonTemplatesTests` to net8 changes in templates #29197
  • Enable C# language version 12 in `CommonTemplatesTests` #29195
  • "CreateAppHost" task failed unexpectedly #29188
  • Installing .net 7 on 20.04 should give error instead of silently install and not worked. #29184

Closed

  • Miscellaneous .NET 7 work #22362
    7.0.1xx
  • Make separate previews/RCs separate bands for workloads #22150
    7.0.1xx
  • Update template metadata for net8.0 #29059
  • C# 11.0 Language Support for .NET 6? #29187
  • [release/7.0.2xx] Runtime fails to generate native System.Private.CoreLib in source-build bootstrap #29177

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve build stability by ensuring we aren't double publishing everywhere #29182
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • 8.0 template packages #27486
    Area-Common templates
  • Introduce MSBuild task frontend for the Roslyn-based GenAPI #29146
    Area-GenAPI

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2052141 #28957
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the desktop test projects #28932
    Area-Infrastructure
  • 'dotnet configure add' command for adding new config to a solution file #29139
  • dotnet tool install skip unlisted version #28951
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Template verifier adoption in CommonTemplateTests #28707
    Area-dotnet new, Area-Common templates
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29158
    Area-dotnet new
  • Don't Infer RID outside of dotnet publish for PublishSingleFile/PublishAot #29031
    area-runtime, Area-CLI, Area-SingleFile, Area-NativeAOT
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #29132
    Area-Infrastructure
